channel.title: Version 5.2 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.2.0 (2022-08-03) Change Change If youâ€™ve set collapsibleMenu = true 'n yer hugo.toml, th' menu will be expanded if a search term be found 'n a collapsed submenu. Th' menu will return t' its initial collapse state once th' search term does not match any submenus.
